item.title: Azteca to Reopen With Mexico Facing Ronaldo's Portugal in March Friendly
item.description: Azteca Stadium is set to reopen in March when Mexico hosts Portugal and Cristiano Ronaldo in a friendly match ahead of the 2026 World Cup.

item.title: The Big Picture: Who Will Win AFC South? Colts Skid Opens Things Up For Jags, Texans
item.description: With five weeks left, the AFC South is suddenly a three team race. Who among the Jaguars, Colts or Texans has the edge to win the division?

item.title: The Big Picture: Who Will Win NFC West? Outlining Rams, Seahawks, 49ers Paths
item.description: The NFL's best division already has three teams with nine wins. Who has the edge among the Rams, Seahawks and 49ers entering December?

item.title: Multi-Platinum Rapper Toosii Commits to Playing Football at Syracuse

item.title: 2026 World Cup Draw: What Are Pots?
item.description: Here's how the pots work for the 2026 World Cup draw on FOX.
